summary: Unicode is a way to represent all the world's written languages on computers. It has over 150,000 characters, including letters, numbers, and symbols. This system replaced older, less compatible methods, making it easier to use different languages online. Unicode is used for most text on the internet and in modern software. It also includes emoji, which became popular worldwide because of this standard. The Unicode Consortium maintains this system, providing tools and guidelines for developers.
title: Unicode
